task.title: Reserve an Affix
task.shortdesc: Before reserving and applying an affix to a horse, you'll need at least 30 days of seniority on the game. You may reserve one affix for every 30 days of seniority you have. The number of affixes you are eligible to reserve is cumulative.

step.cmd: In the homepage menu bar, navigate to Breeding farm then Office. The My affixes tab displays.
At the bottom of the page, select Reserve an affix. The affix reservation window displays.
Give your affix a name and description.
